Posts.Content: Erectile function returned at about 3 months post RRP. I would say mine is 95% + of what it was pre-surgery. I still lightly soak a pad a day, but I'll take that over the other any day. BTW -- I was 37, about to turn 38 when I had my surgery....so like you (being a youngin', as we say in the South), full or nearly full recovery was critical.
